intro.description: I'm a web developer. I work at Immera as of now and will be beginning my Master's degree in Informatics Engineering in September. Previously, I interned as a UX/UI designer at EDP, creating wireframes and final product designs, and as a backend developer at Xplora, developing API endpoints. I hold a bachelor's degree in Communication & Multimedia from Universidade de TrÃ¡s-os-Montes e Alto Douro.
